epiboards 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Reactable bar column

    col_bar.Rd

    Creates a reactable::colDef object with bar formatting (horizontal bars are added to the background of each cell proprtional to their value scaled by the maximum of the column). Useful for columns of numeric data.

    Usage

    col_bar(
  df,
  col,
  name = col,
  tooltip = NULL,
  color = "#c5c5c5",
  digits = 0,
  percent = FALSE,
  ...,
  min_width = 75,
  border_right = NULL
)

    Arguments

    df

    dataframe Dataframe of data used in the table.

    col

    chr Column name of the data (in df).

    name

    chr Display name of the column to be used as the header. Default is col.

    tooltip

    chr Tooltip text to be added to the header. Default is NULL.

    color

    chr CSS appropriate string indicating the bar color.

    digits

    int Number of decimal digits to display. Default is 0.

    percent

    bool Whether to format the column as a percent. Default is FALSE.

    ...

    Additional arguments to be passed to reactable::reactable.

    min_width

    int Minimum width for the column.

    border_right

    bool / chr Right side border to be added. Default is NULL.

    On this page
